text: The 1759 English cricket season was the 16th season following the earliest known codification of the Laws of Cricket. Details have survived of three eleven-a-side matches between significant teams. ==Matches== Three eleven-a- side match between significant teams are known to have taken place.ACS, p.22.Other matches in England 1759, CricketArchive. Retrieved 2019-02-08. *5 Sept - Dartford v England XI - Dartford Brent *6 Sept - Dartford v England XI - Dartford Brent *12 Sept - England XI v Dartford - Laleham Burway ==First mentions== ===Players=== * John Edmeads (Chertsey and Surrey) * Gill (Buckinghamshire) ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==Further reading== * * * * * * Category:1759 in English cricket Category:English cricket seasons from 1598 to 1763
title: 1759 English cricket season
